attributes.action: Put a windfall tax on MP'S who have made big profit made on second homes with expenses from the tax payer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Just as it was right to ask companys to pay windfall tax on there greedy profits it is only right to ask greedy MP's to do the same

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
